title: Congressional Response Failure: Legislative Branch Paralysis During Constitutional Crisis
description: Examine how partisan gridlock prevented Congressional action on emoluments violations, emergency powers abuse, and constitutional remedies during the 2025 crisis.
research_areas: What specific legislation was proposed to address emoluments violations?
Which Congressional hearings addressed the National Guard federalization?
How did partisan voting patterns prevent constitutional remedies?
What impeachment discussions occurred during the crisis period?
source_requirements: Congressional hearing transcripts, proposed legislation, committee reports, voting records
pdf_source: Constitutional Crisis Assessment_ The Convergence of Foreign Emoluments, Federal Overreach, and Popular Resistance.pdf
